heroes.name: Nuna
heroes.title: Science behind the D-Day landings
heroes.description: How innovations in science and engineering made the D-Day landings possible with giant troop tanks and tanks that could drive on water.

heroes.name: Casey
heroes.title: Computex: Intel shows off new tech
heroes.description: Intel is showcasing a laptop with a 3D camera and motion control technology at the Computex show in Taiwan.
